author: Dov Lieber
title: Gaza Explosion Hits Convoy of Palestinian Prime Minister
text:
Tensions heated up between the Palestinian Authority and Hamas after the prime minister survived an attack on his motorcade during a rare visit to the Gaza Strip, the latest setback in efforts to mend a decadelong rift.

The prime minister, Rami Hamdallah, wasnâ€™t hurt in what officials described as an assassination attempt on Tuesday, but at least seven members of the convoy were injured in the blast, Palestinian Authority officials said. Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas blamed Gaza rulers Hamas for the attack....
